Just a little reminder that artwork, whether stories or graphics, 
should be posted over on shq_spy_division so we can keep the files 
here as factual as possible.  :-D

To my fellow wolves here, Miser Bellatrix does some wonderful artwork 
and also writes (Miser, don't you have one in progress?  Or am I 
confusing you with someone else?).  Definitely NOT lacking in brains!!

phil (who woke up to 91 messages in her inbox, including several
